indications:
Indications 
(From 8.3.2 Progestogens: British National Formulary)
8.3.2 Progestogens
name: MEGESTROL ACETATE
breadcrumbs: 8.3 Sex hormones and hormone antagonists in malignant disease
cautions:
Cautions see under Medroxyprogesterone acetate (section
6.4.1.2) and notes above; interactions: Appendix 1 (progestogens)
side-effects:
Side-effects see under Medroxyprogesterone acetate (section
6.4.1.2) and notes above; also reported vomiting, carpal tunnel syndrome, Cushing’s syndrome, and tumour
flare (with or without hypercalcaemia)
pregnancy:
Pregnancy avoid; reversible feminisation of male fetuses reported
in animal studies; risk of hypospadias in male fetuses
and masculinisation of female fetuses
